response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe perfectly aligns with your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am confident it will significantly contribute to your endeavors. Considering its true worth and the benefits it offers, I kindly propose a price of $12,500 for this exclusive item. This offer not only reflects the product's intrinsic value but also provides you with a substantial savings compared to its market value. I look forward to discussing this opportunity further and potentially bringing this remarkable product into your possession.", "product_price": 12500}
